donation.title: Donate to NOSSAS
donation.description: NOSSAS is supported exclusively by people and foundations who believe in our work and in the impact we want to see in the world. Make your donation!

success.title: Thanks, {{name}}!
success.thanks: Your donation makes all the difference!
success.message: Thank you for your donation - it will help us continue our work :)

1.title: Geração Que Move
1.description: Geração Que Move is a training program in social mobilization, and is the result of a partnership between NOSSAS and UNICEF, aimed at young people from Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo who want to transform their cities.

2.title: Sem Licença Pra Matar
2.description: A proposal to reform the Military Penal Code makes room for police officers accused in cases of murder or aggression not to be trialed. We need to stop this absurd!

3.title: EmLuta
3.description: Over 5 million brazilians have lost family members and loved ones to Covid-19. It's time to mobilize and demand the public power to ensure that these families are not left without support.

4.title: Cadê Meu Absorvente?
4.description: Several bills have been approved in many states in Brazil, but it is about time we had a national law to ensure the distribution of sanitary pads over the country.
4.navigate: Pressure for menstrual dignity for all

5.title: Praça Pôr do Sol without fences NOW!
5.description: The Praça Pôr do Sol was fenced off by the São Paulo City Hall without any public debate! It's time to ask for the City Hall to change this policy and prevent the definitive fencing of the square!

6.title: Parque Realengo Verde
6.description: Residents of Realengo, a district in the West Zone of Rio de Janeiro, have been fighting over decades to keep one of the last green areas in the region standing.
6.navigate: Pressure for an urban and ecological park

7.title: Livre Para Menstruar
7.description: In several states in Brazil, girls are articulating bills on menstrual poverty.

8.title: Sai da Fossa, Manaus!
8.description: In the city of Manaus, 8 out of 10 inhabitants do not have access to the sewage system. It's time to demand that the mayor guarantee increased coverage of this service to all city's citizens.

9.title: Tem gente com fome
9.description: A national mobilization is raising funds to fight hunger and poverty during the pandemic. Food is needed, hunger cannot wait!

10.title: MUVUCA
10.description: NOSSAS’ first climate activism program will offer training over six months to young people fighting for a viable future for our planet.

newsletter.title: Stay in touch
newsletter.description: Sign up to receive notifications about NOSSAS' campaigns, projects and other opportunities (in Portuguese):

success.title: It cost!
success.description: Glad you're here :) We'll send you news about NOSSAS' projects, reports and campaigns through this email.
